tgt_original: vajrakarma mahārakṣa caṇḍayakṣa mahāgraha |  vajramuṣṭi mahāmudra sarvamudra namo'stu te || 3 ||
sarvajña sarvakṛt sarva sarvadarśi namo'stu te || 5 ||
buddhahuṃkara huṃkāra vajrahuṃkara dāmaka |  viśvavajrāḍga vajrogra vajrapāṇe namo'stu te || 16 ||
anena stotrarājena yaḥ stuyādbai subhaktitaḥ |  yo gāyaṃstu stuyāt so'pi bhavedvajradharopamaḥ || 19 ||
